code:
graph TB
    APB[FinTech_LedgerService] --> DESC_ENG[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    CFG[FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> DESC_ENG
    CFG --> SCHED

    subgraph "Scheduler Group"
        subgraph "Descriptor Engine"
            DESC_ENG --> |desc_ar_*| DESC_AXI[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            DESC_AXI --> |desc_r_data| DESC_PARSE[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            DESC_PARSE --> |descriptor_packet 256-bit| DESC_OUT[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            DESC_ENG --> |mon_valid/packet| DESC_MON[FinTech_LedgerService]
        end

        DESC_OUT --> |descriptor_valid/ready| SCHED[FinTech_AuthVault]

        subgraph "Scheduler"
            SCHED --> |datard_valid/addr/beats| RD_IF[FinTech_AuthVault]
            SCHED --> |datawr_valid/addr/beats| WR_IF[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            RD_IF --> |datard_done_strobe| SCHED
            WR_IF --> |datawr_done_strobe| SCHED
            SCHED --> |mon_valid/packet| SCHED_MON[FinTech_AuthVault]
        end

        DESC_MON --> ARB[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        SCHED_MON --> ARB
        ARB --> |mon_valid/ready/packet| MON_OUT[FinTech_LedgerService]
    end

    RD_IF --> RD_ENG[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    WR_IF --> WR_ENG[FinTech_LedgerService]
    RD_ENG --> |datard_done| RD_IF
    WR_ENG --> |datawr_done| WR_IF
    MON_OUT --> SYS_MON[FinTech_FraudDetection]

    style DESC_ENG fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style SCHED fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
    style ARB fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
